messages.subject: waiting to homeschool
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/12/03 3:28:52 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/12/03 3:28:52 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
We're home now and he's just watching cartoons. My son is more relaxed today
than I have seen him in a long time. I can't wait for him to "graduate" 3rd
grade in June so he can come home for a real education. >>

Why on earth would you need him to "graduate" THIRD grade?
He is being damaged every day he is there. If he's happy at home, let him
come home...for good!!!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
